Reviews.Content: not like the website... I was very disappointed when I arrived at this hotel - lobby was shabby and no sign of the 'refurbishments' mentioned in their website. Room was drab and bathroom had cracked toilet seat and cracks in the plaster. Overall a very poor hotel and I would hardly rate this as even a one-star. The only good point was the location - five minutes walk from Santa Croce church and central to all the main sights.
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member

Reviews.Content: Peaceful and good attention A very nice hotel. Its architectural structure is a little strange, but is compensated for the employees? amiability and attention. It is no in the centre of the city but is a small city, and in ten minutes you?re at the best monuments. It's clean. It's quiet, far away from railway, or market, you has a relaxed sleep.
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member

Reviews.Content: Not as described This hotel has not been completely refurbished as indicated in the description, at least not anytime recently. We booked four months in advance, requesting a quiet upper floor room. We were given a lower front room that needed some serious maintenance and had a lot of street noise.
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
